alert.note: Alert for Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued November 20 at 10:31PM CST until November 21 at 1:45AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... West Central Pike County in southern Mississippi... * Until 145 AM CST. * At 1031 PM CST, the public reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Mccomb. This includes the follwing Interstate... Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 17 and 18. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
